statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_account_id, receiver_account_id FROM transactions ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_account_id = 'abc123' AND receiver_account_id = 'xyz456';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT sender_account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, date_time FROM transactions WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT full_name, account_balance FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC, full_name ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT MAX(amount), MIN(amount), AVG(amount) FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-10-01' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY from_account ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT from_account, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY from_account HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM accounts a JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.to_account WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC, account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE sender_account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT method_name FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT method_name, user_id FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id IN (1, 2, 3);
